channel.title: Posts on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: K8s in Action Running App in K8s
item.description: 重点 理解如何创建和何时创建group containers 用yaml文件创建pod，运行app 与app交互，查看log和运行环境 扩展主容器，增加sidecar容

item.title: K8s in Action02 Use K8s
item.description: 入门 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 minikube version # 运行k8s集群 minikube start kubectl version # 查看集群信息 kubectl cluster-info # 查看节点信息 kubectl get nodes 配置k8s集群 方法: minikube 单节点 kubeadm 多节点 使用miniku

item.title: 搭建博客
item.description: 安装hugo https://gohugo.io/ 创建博客 1 hugo new site blog 添加主题 1 git submodule add https://github.com/olOwOlo/hugo-theme-even themes/even 创建第一篇文章 1 hugo new post/first_post.md 自定义域名 https://gohugo.io/hosting-and-deployment/hosting-on-github/
